abstract: After Comcast bought NBCUniversal four years ago, it surprised some by not only hanging onto the company’s theme parks, but investing heavily in their expansion.
snippet: After Comcast bought NBCUniversal four years ago, it surprised some by not only hanging onto the company’s theme parks, but investing heavily in their expansion.
lead_paragraph: ORLANDO, Fla. — The Universal theme park chain was the last thing Comcast was interested in when it bought NBCUniversal four years ago. Endless upkeep? Endless spending on new rides? Endless anxiety about public safety?

headline.main: Comcast Invests by the Billion in Theme Parks, Hogwarts and All
headline.print_headline: Investing in Parks, Hogwarts and All
